LanguageData.ChunkGoldOre.label: gold ore
LanguageData.ChunkGoldOre.description: A chunk of gold containing ore. It's useless in its current form, however it can be smelted to aquire puryfied resource.
LanguageData.ChunkIronOre.label: iron ore
LanguageData.ChunkIronOre.description: A piece of iron ore. It's useless in its current form, it can be smelted to aquire puryfied ore.
LanguageData.ChunkPlasteelOre.label: plasteel ore
LanguageData.ChunkPlasteelOre.description: Not really an ore, the remains of ancient structure compressed by elements. They need to be purified and reshaped to be usable.
LanguageData.ChunkSilverOre.label: silver ore
LanguageData.ChunkSilverOre.description: A chunk, containing silver ore. It's useless in its current form, it can be smelted to aquire resource .
LanguageData.ChunkUraniumOre.label: uranium ore
LanguageData.ChunkUraniumOre.description: A chunk of uranium ore. It contains miniscule amount of resource, and it needs pulverized, refined with acid, then smelted into usable form.
